title: Production State Energy Consumption
description: JSON Schema for capturing energy consumption data associated with specific production states in a manufacturing environment. This schema is designed to help analyze energy usage patterns based on machine states, enabling optimization of energy efficiency during production processes.

Site.description: Name of the manufacturing site or facility

Cell.description: Work cell or station within the line

State.description: Current production state (e.g., Running, Idle, Stopped)

EnergyReading.description: Cumulative energy meter reading in kWh

EnergyConsumption.description: Energy consumed during this state period in kWh

StateDuration.description: Duration of the current state (ISO 8601 duration or human-readable)

EnergyConsumptionPerMinute.description: Average energy consumption rate in kWh per minute
